feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING, North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 p.m. ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: SE 23 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain late this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 90 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
